sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { slideIndex = 1; plusSlides(n:number){ this.showSlides(this.slideIndex += n); } currentSlide(n:number){ this.showSlides(this.slideIndex = n); } showSlides(slideIndex:number):any; showSlides(n:number){ let i; let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("slides") as HTMLCollectionOf; let dots = document.getElementsByClassName("dot") as HTMLCollectionOf; if (n > slides.length) {this.slideIndex = 1} if (n < 1) {this.slideIndex = slides.length} for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) { slides[i].style.display = "none"; } for (i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) { dots[i].className = dots[i].className.replace(" active", ""); } if(slides[this.slideIndex-1]) slides[this.slideIndex-1].style.display = "block"; if(dots[this.slideIndex-1]) dots[this.slideIndex-1].className += " active"; } }
Xandré Sage The Author

About The Author

Xandré Sage is an American writer of fiction books for all ages, but best known for her new adult science fiction, Our Space. Growing up in New Orleans, Xandré Sage always loved reading stories, especially in Audubon Park. She struggled with Dyslexia but was stubborn enough to keep trying, often being caught reading fiction books with a Dragon Tales flashlight at night. Xandré quickly developed a passion for a plethora of genres, including fantasy, science fiction, thriller, and just about anything that could blossom into an adventure. Tolkien, Brandon Sanderson, George R.R. Martin, and J.K. Rowling are writers that inspire Xandré. Engrossed in stories throughout the COVID-19 pandemic, she found a love for worldbuilding and character development and pursued her Creative Writing degree. Xandré Sage has now written fantasy, science fiction, romance, and thrillers. She currently resides in California with her fiancé and three dogs.

Original Poem

Books and Content:

The House on St. Charles Ave. is the novel Xan is currently working on. She has two other unnamed books in the prepping process.

Currently Reading

A Court of Wings and Ruin
by Sarah J. Maas
The Assassin's Blade
by Sarah J. Maas
City of Glass
by Cassandra Clare
